data.text:
I am――the Uma Musume who will win against that 
unbeatable Brian-chan! ……Laurel. I'm Sakura Laurel♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I am――the Uma Musume who will win against that 
<story>unbeatable Brian-chan! ……Laurel. I'm Sakura Laurel♪

data.text:
The Uma Musume that can't run, Sakura Laurel, just declared 
that she would win against Narita Brian. However……
data.processed:
<story>The Uma Musume that can't run, Sakura Laurel, just declared 
<story>that she would win against Narita Brian. However……

data.text:
If you can't run, then you can't win. 
That part concerned me……

choices.text: I want to know. Why can't you run?
I want to know. Why can't you run?

data.processed:
<story>If you can't run, then you can't win. 
<story>That part concerned me……

data.text:
Ah, um……well, about that…… 
Of course, I don't mean that I can't run at all……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Ah, um……well, about that…… 
<story>Of course, I don't mean that I can't run at all……

data.text:
……right, if it's just a little, maybe it should be fine. 
In which case, we can head to the course now……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>……right, if it's just a little, maybe it should be fine. 
<story>In which case, we can head to the course now……

data.text: Wait just a minute!
data.name: 2 Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Wait just a minute!

data.text:
When Sakura Laurel was about to head to the course, 
two Uma Musume came rushing towards her.
data.processed:
<story>When Sakura Laurel was about to head to the course, 
<story>two Uma Musume came rushing towards her.

data.text:
Laurel-san, please don't push yourself~! 
Suddenly running without any kind of warm-up is reckless~.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Laurel-san, please don't push yourself~! 
<story>Suddenly running without any kind of warm-up is reckless~.

data.text:
Indeed! I can't just let that pass! 
After all, I'm a class rep!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Indeed! I can't just let that pass! 
<story>After all, I'm a class rep!

data.text:
Hello, nice to meet you! I'm Sakura Bakushin O! 
The class rep that always goes full throttle, Bakushin!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Hello, nice to meet you! I'm Sakura Bakushin O! 
<story>The class rep that always goes full throttle, Bakushin!

data.text:
I'm Sakura Chiyono O. I've always been in Laurel-san's 
care since I was young. Together with Laurel-san, we're――
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>I'm Sakura Chiyono O. I've always been in Laurel-san's 
<story>care since I was young. Together with Laurel-san, we're――

data.text: Uma Musume from the 『Victory Club』!
data.name: Both
data.processed: <story>Uma Musume from the 『Victory Club』!

data.text: Right! It's a long story, but……
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Right! It's a long story, but……

data.text:
But before that! Laurel-san, please take more 
care of yourself. After all, um, your legs……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>But before that! Laurel-san, please take more 
<story>care of yourself. After all, um, your legs……

data.text:
Fufuu, thank you for worrying about me, Chiyo-chan. 
You're right, ever since I was little, my legs……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, thank you for worrying about me, Chiyo-chan. 
<story>You're right, ever since I was little, my legs……

data.text: Have been called 『Legs of Glass』.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Have been called 『Legs of Glass』.

data.text: Ah, in regards to that, let me explain.
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Ah, in regards to that, let me explain.

data.text:
After that, Sakura Bakushin O began 
telling me about their younger days.
data.processed:
<story>After that, Sakura Bakushin O began 
<story>telling me about their younger days.

data.text:
The 『Victory Club』 that we are a part of is a place for 
little Uma Musume to gather. It's a famous training club.
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>The 『Victory Club』 that we are a part of is a place for 
<story>little Uma Musume to gather. It's a famous training club.

data.text:
The club's policies are 『Always carry strong feelings!』 
and 『Be positive, and full of energy!』. Due to that……
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>The club's policies are 『Always carry strong feelings!』 
<story>and 『Be positive, and full of energy!』. Due to that……

data.text:
Ah! Everyone, make way, make way! 
You are in the presence of the king of Yamato!
data.name: Young Uma Musume A
data.processed:
<story>Ah! Everyone, make way, make way! 
<story>You are in the presence of the king of Yamato!

data.text:
No way, no way! Because I'm the king of the world. 
When I run, of course, I'm the best in the world~!
data.name: Young Uma Musume B
data.processed:
<story>No way, no way! Because I'm the king of the world. 
<story>When I run, of course, I'm the best in the world~!

data.text:
It was a gathering place for Uma Musume with the name O, 
and the attitude of O. And among those girls, Laurel-san was……
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>It was a gathering place for Uma Musume with the name O, 
<story>and the attitude of O. And among those girls, Laurel-san was……

data.text:
Um, I'm sorry. 
I can't run very well yet. But……
data.name: Young Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Um, I'm sorry. 
<story>I can't run very well yet. But……

data.text:
So I'm not a bother, I'll do my best! 
And I'll help out with anything I can♪
data.name: Young Laurel
data.processed:
<story>So I'm not a bother, I'll do my best! 
<story>And I'll help out with anything I can♪

data.text:
Compared to the other girls, she was more reserved 
but still positive. She was also very caring and was 
always there to help when anyone got in trouble.
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Compared to the other girls, she was more reserved 
<story>but still positive. She was also very caring and was 
<story>always there to help when anyone got in trouble.

data.text:
Laurel-san was like everyone's big sister. 
She can keep track of so many things at the same time.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Laurel-san was like everyone's big sister. 
<story>She can keep track of so many things at the same time.

data.text:
It's because……since the beginning, my legs 
have been weak♪ Often, I'd have to keep calm, 
otherwise I couldn't properly cover for you.
data.name: Sakura Laurel

choices.text: Then, by 『Legs of Glass』 you mean……
Then, by 『Legs of Glass』 you mean……

data.processed:
<story>It's because……since the beginning, my legs 
<story>have been weak♪ Often, I'd have to keep calm, 
<story>otherwise I couldn't properly cover for you.

data.text:
Yes. Ever since I was young, my legs haven't 
been very sturdy so I couldn't run very much.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Yes. Ever since I was young, my legs haven't 
<story>been very sturdy so I couldn't run very much.

data.text:
An Uma Musume but she couldn't run…… 
I wonder how stressful that was.
data.processed:
<story>An Uma Musume but she couldn't run…… 
<story>I wonder how stressful that was.

data.text:
An Uma Musume with 『Legs of Glass』, Sakura Laurel. 
But then, why did she……

choices.text: Then why did you come to Tracen?

data.processed:
<story>An Uma Musume with 『Legs of Glass』, Sakura Laurel. 
<story>But then, why did she……

data.text: Well, that's because-
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Well, that's because-

data.text:
Ah, wait a minute. Maybe calling it 『Legs of Glass』 
is causing a misunderstanding. In that case……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Ah, wait a minute. Maybe calling it 『Legs of Glass』 
<story>is causing a misunderstanding. In that case……

data.text:
I can show you some footage from a mock race. 
I've got a video of the three of us running together 
when Laurel-san was in good condition.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>I can show you some footage from a mock race. 
<story>I've got a video of the three of us running together 
<story>when Laurel-san was in good condition.

data.text:
Saying that, Sakura Chiyono O showed me the 
video on her smartphone. And what I saw was……
data.processed:
<story>Saying that, Sakura Chiyono O showed me the 
<story>video on her smartphone. And what I saw was……

data.text:
Fortune favors the fast!! Oriyaaaaaaaa!! 
Just Bakushin, Bakushin!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Fortune favors the fast!! Oriyaaaaaaaa!! 
<story>Just Bakushin, Bakushin!

data.text:
Kuuuuuu, Bakushin O-san, you're fast……! 
But……if I just keep up with you until the end~……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Kuuuuuu, Bakushin O-san, you're fast……! 
<story>But……if I just keep up with you until the end~……

data.text:
(Baku-chan……Chiyo-chan……they're both amazing…… 
Compared to them, the amount of training I do is nothing……)
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>(Baku-chan……Chiyo-chan……they're both amazing…… 
<story>Compared to them, the amount of training I do is nothing……)

data.text:
(But, even then……I'm happy! This is fun……! 
I can run as much as I want……in this moment……!)
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>(But, even then……I'm happy! This is fun……! 
<story>I can run as much as I want……in this moment……!)

data.text:
(Right……I will bloom! 
Don't think about what comes after――only now!!)
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>(Right……I will bloom! 
<story>Don't think about what comes after――only now!!)

data.text: Haaaaaaa!!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Haaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Eeeeh, Laurel-san……!? 
In just a moment, you've come this far……!?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Eeeeh, Laurel-san……!? 
<story>In just a moment, you've come this far……!?

data.text: Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Chowa-!? Don't tell me……!? 
Even against this full stamina Bakushin……!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Chowa-!? Don't tell me……!? 
<story>Even against this full stamina Bakushin……!?

data.text:
The speed and form of her run was――stunning. It was 
a running style that emphasized slamming her feet in 
to the ground to push forward. She was almost like――
data.processed:
<story>The speed and form of her run was――stunning. It was 
<story>a running style that emphasized slamming her feet in 
<story>to the ground to push forward. She was almost like――

data.text:
――A cherry blossom petal dancing through the air. 
Even though it seemed like she was flying, it was 
obvious that a huge burden was placed on her weakened legs.
data.processed:
<story>――A cherry blossom petal dancing through the air. 
<story>Even though it seemed like she was flying, it was 
<story>obvious that a huge burden was placed on her weakened legs.

data.text:
That's right. My form is a little unusual, and while 
I can't run much, just a little is fine♪ And also……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>That's right. My form is a little unusual, and while 
<story>I can't run much, just a little is fine♪ And also……

data.text: I have a――"dream" I want to fulfill.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>I have a――"dream" I want to fulfill.

data.text:
……Yes. I'm looking for someone that wants to see 
that "dream" together with me. For that reason……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>……Yes. I'm looking for someone that wants to see 
<story>that "dream" together with me. For that reason……

data.text:
I'm thinking of entering a Selection race soon. 
After all, with my legs being the way they are, 
there might be only one chance to run at full strength……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I'm thinking of entering a Selection race soon. 
<story>After all, with my legs being the way they are, 
<story>there might be only one chance to run at full strength……

data.text: But, I intend to put everything in to that one chance!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>But, I intend to put everything in to that one chance!

data.text:
Ooooh, a Selection race! 
So you've finally resolved yourself, Laurel-san!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Ooooh, a Selection race! 
<story>So you've finally resolved yourself, Laurel-san!

data.text:
Uuuu……I want to cheer for you but, I can't help but worry~. 
At least, don't push yourself too hard……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Uuuu……I want to cheer for you but, I can't help but worry~. 
<story>At least, don't push yourself too hard……

data.text:
Yeah! I don't plan on being reckless. 
I just want to do my best to show what I can do right now.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! I don't plan on being reckless. 
<story>I just want to do my best to show what I can do right now.

data.text:
That's why, if you're up for it, why don't 
you come watch, Trainer-san? ――My run, that is.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>That's why, if you're up for it, why don't 
<story>you come watch, Trainer-san? ――My run, that is.

data.text:
To see if I can really perform in the Twinkle Series, 
and whether I'm an Uma Musume that can fulfill that dream……!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>To see if I can really perform in the Twinkle Series, 
<story>and whether I'm an Uma Musume that can fulfill that dream……!

data.text:
My expectations were rising. 
And at the same time――so were my worries.
data.processed:
<story>My expectations were rising. 
<story>And at the same time――so were my worries.

data.text:
Even with those Legs of Glass, would Sakura Laurel really be able 
to run to the end in the Selection race and shine brightly?
data.processed:
<story>Even with those Legs of Glass, would Sakura Laurel really be able 
<story>to run to the end in the Selection race and shine brightly?
